steps.title: Initial Access
steps.description: Enter the four-digit code on the keypad. The order of the digits does not matter.

steps.title: Troubleshooting: Screen Lock
steps.description: If the screen locks up (numbers displayed and unresponsive), repeatedly press any key on the keypad until the screen goes blank with a red blinking light. This resets the keypad.

steps.title: Accessing After Reset
steps.description: Once the screen is blank and the red light is blinking, re-enter the four-digit code to access the system.

steps.title: Successful Entry Confirmation
steps.description: Confirm that the system has been accessed successfully (e.g., the door unlocks, a new screen appears).
